text: Ngempela nanenzelwe isibonakaliso emabuthweni amabili ahlangana alwa, elinye ibutho laliwa lizabalaza endleleni kaMvelinqangi elinye lalingakholwa lalibabona bephindeke kabili (kunabo) kwakungukubona nje kwamehlo abo uMvelinqangi uyameseka ngosizo lwakhe lowo amthandayo ngempela kulokho kunesifundo kulabo abanokubona
